name: cfcs-root
description: CFCs(Cross Framework Components) are modules that convert components into framework usage.

scripts.packages: npm run packages:update && npm run packages:build && npm run packages:publish
scripts.packages:build: npm run build --prefix packages/core && lerna run build --ignore @cfcs/core --ignore @cfcs/angular --ignore docs --stream
scripts.docs:build: yarn docs:core && yarn docs:react && yarn docs:vue2 && yarn docs:vue3 && yarn docs:svelte
scripts.demo:build: npm run docs:build && npm run packages:build && npm run build --prefix packages/docs
